id.description: The unique identifier of the song.

albumArtist.description: The artist of the album the song belongs to.

albumArt.description: The URL of the album art image.

duration.description: The duration of the song in milliseconds.

trackNumber.description: The track number of the song in the album.

discNumber.description: The disc number of the song in the album.

playCount.description: The number of times the song has been played.

uniqueListeners.description: The number of unique listeners who have played the song.

albumUri.description: The URI of the album the song belongs to.

artistUri.description: The URI of the artist of the song.

sha256.description: The SHA256 hash of the song.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the song was created.
